<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205845</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chesterwood: Workshop of an American Sculptor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chesterwood: Werkstatt eines amerikanischen 
Sculptor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chesterwood : Atelier d'un sculpteur 
américain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chesterwood: Oficina de um sculptor 
americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chesterwood: Workshop di uno scultore 
americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Chesterwood: Εργαστήριο ενός αμερικανικού 
γλύπτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chesterwood: Taller de un escultor 
americano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes the work and estate of one of America's most important sculptors. Daniel Chester French (1850-1931) produced more than 100 works?the statue of Abraham Lincoln for the Lincoln Memorial?during a period when sculptors enjoyed high status. Models and sketches from the Lincoln project, which took nine years, are provided, as are photos of the farmhouse that he converted into his estate and workshop.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt die Arbeit und den Zustand von einem 
von Amerikas wichtigsten Sculptors. Daniel Chester Franzosen 
(1850-1931) produzierten die mehr als 100 works?the Statue von Abraham
Lincoln für das Lincoln Memorial?during ein Periode, als Sculptors 
hohen Status genossen. Modelle und Skizzen vom Lincoln 
projizieren sich, das neun Jahre dauerte, werden zur Verfügung 
gestellt, wie Fotos des Bauernhauses sind, daß er in seinen Zustand 
und Werkstatt umwandelte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit le travail et le domaine d'un des 
sculpteurs les plus importants de l'Amérique. Le Français de 
Daniel Chester (1850-1931) a produit la statue de plus de 100 
works?the d'Abraham Lincoln pour Lincoln Memorial?during par période 
où les sculpteurs ont apprécié le mode élevé. Les modèles 
et les croquis de Lincoln projettent, qui a pris neuf ans, sont 
fournis, de même que des photos de la ferme qu'il a converti en son 
domaine et atelier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve o trabalho e a propriedade de um dos 
sculptors os mais importantes de América. O francês de Daniel 
Chester (1850-1931) produziu a estátua de mais de 100 works?the de 
Abraham Lincoln para o Lincoln Memorial?during um o período em que os
sculptors apreciaram o status elevado. Os modelos e os esboços 
do Lincoln projetam-se, que fêz exame de nove anos, são fornecidos, 
como são fotos do farmhouse que se converteu em suas propriedade e 
oficina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive il lavoro e la proprietà di uno degli 
scultori più importanti dell'America. Il francese del Daniel 
Chester (1850-1931) ha prodotto una statua dei più di 100 works?the 
di Abraham Lincoln per Lincoln Memorial?during un il periodo in cui 
gli scultori hanno goduto l'alta condizione. I modelli e gli 
abbozzi da Lincoln si proiettano, che ha occorr nove anni, sono 
forniti, come sono foto della fattoria che si è convertito in suoi 
proprietà e workshop.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει την εργασία και το κτήμα ένας από τους 
σημαντικότερους γλύπτες της Αμερικής. Ο Ντάνιελ Τσέστερ 
γαλλικά (1850-1931) παρήγαγε το άγαλμα περισσότερου από 100
works?the του Abraham Λίνκολν για το Λίνκολν 
Memorial?during μια περίοδος όταν απόλαυσαν οι γλύπτες την 
υψηλή θέση. Τα μοντέλα και τα σκίτσα από το πρόγραμμα του 
Λίνκολν, που διάρκεσε εννέα έτη, παρέχονται, όπως είναι οι 
φωτογραφίες farmhouse ότι μετέτρεψε στο κτήμα και το 
εργαστήριό του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe el trabajo y el estado de uno de los 
escultores más importantes de América. El francés de Daniel 
Chester (1850-1931) produjo la estatua de más de 100 works?the de 
Abraham Lincoln para la Lincoln Memorial?during al período en que los
escultores gozaron de alto estatus. Los modelos y los bosquejos 
de la Lincoln proyectan, que tomó nueve años, se proporcionan, al 
igual que fotos del cortijo que él convirtió en su estado y taller.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205845</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108344</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/chesterwood-workshop-of-an-american-sculptor</uri>

</expression>
